<a id="FoldableGroup"></a>

# FoldableGroup

**Inherits:** [Resource](Resource.md) **\<** [RefCounted](RefCounted.md) **\<** [Object](Object.md)

A group of foldable containers that doesn't allow more than one container to be expanded at a time.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

A group of [FoldableContainer](FoldableContainer.md)-derived nodes. Only one container can be expanded at a time.

<!-- classref-reftable-group -->

<table>

      <th>[bool](bool.md)</th>

      <td>`true` (overrides [Resource.resource_local_to_scene](Resource.md#Resource_property_resource_local_to_scene))</td>
    </tr>
  </tbody>
</table>

<!-- classref-signal -->

**expanded**\ (\ container\: [FoldableContainer](FoldableContainer.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#FoldableGroup_signal_expanded)

Emitted when one of the containers of the group is expanded.

<!-- classref-descriptions-group -->

## Property Descriptions

<a id="FoldableGroup_property_allow_folding_all"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[bool](bool.md) **allow_folding_all** = `false` [ðŸ”—](#FoldableGroup_property_allow_folding_all)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_allow_folding_all**\ (\ value\: [bool](bool.md)\ )
- [bool](bool.md) **is_allow_folding_all**\ (\ )

If ``true``, it is possible to fold all containers in this FoldableGroup.

<hr class="classref-section-separator"/>

<!-- classref-descriptions-group -->

## Method Descriptions

<a id="FoldableGroup_method_get_containers"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[Array](Array.md)\[[FoldableContainer](FoldableContainer.md)\] **get_containers**\ (\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#FoldableGroup_method_get_containers)

Returns an [Array](Array.md) of [FoldableContainer](FoldableContainer.md)\\ s that have this as their FoldableGroup (see [FoldableContainer.foldable_group](FoldableContainer.md#FoldableContainer_property_foldable_group)). This is equivalent to [ButtonGroup](ButtonGroup.md) but for FoldableContainers.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="FoldableGroup_method_get_expanded_container"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[FoldableContainer](FoldableContainer.md) **get_expanded_container**\ (\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#FoldableGroup_method_get_expanded_container)

Returns the current expanded container.
